tool_description:
~ Bugs fixed!
[+] Temporary Gmail Generator API to fight with spam.
[+] Generates a real Gmail.
[+] Disposable Gmails are more superior than disposable domain emails.
[+] Minimal chances for a website to detect a disposable gmail.



Tags: Gmail Google Mail Temporary Email Disposable Email Temp Mail
name: Disposable Gmail
title: Disposable Gmail

api_list.name: Generate Gmail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-gmail.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-gmail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
